name: A Proper Toadlet Game
description:
A Proper Toadlet Game is a short little mini game made in a few days for a Game Programming Design Principles course (this week's focus being the Singleton and Object Pooling Design Patterns.) Controls:
  • W or Up Arrow or Left Click to jump
  • S or Down Arrow or Right Click to roll
Credits:
  • Design, Programming, and a few Sprites - toadletgames
  • Frog Sprites - LukasLundin
  • Background - ansimuz
  • Font - vrtxrry
